sentences.sContent: This land will be reclaimed for a new airport.
sentences.sCn: 这块土地将被开发用来建新机场。

sentences.sContent: You can reclaim old boards and use them as shelves.
sentences.sCn: 旧木板可以废物利用，当搁板。

synos.tran: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改

remMethod.val: re(向后) ＋ claim(要求) → 要求恢复 → 要回

trans.tranOther: to make an area of desert, wet land etc suitable for farming or building
